Namespace Pothosware.SoapySDR

Classes

ArgInfo

Representation of a key/value argument.

ArgInfoList

ArgInfoList.ArgInfoListEnumerator

BuildInfo

Version strings for the SoapySDR versions used at runtime and for this build.

BuildInfo.Assembly

Version strings for the SoapySDR version used to build this assembly.

BuildInfo.Runtime

Version strings for the SoapySDR build currently installed.

BuildInfo.SWIGModule

Version strings for the SoapySDR version used to build the underlying SWIG module.

Device

Abstraction for an SDR transceiver device - configuration and streaming.

Kwargs

Kwargs.KwargsEnumerator

KwargsList

KwargsList.KwargsListEnumerator

Logger

SoapySDR's logging interface.

Through this, messages can be logged to console or file by registering C# delegates. The logging API is designed to match System.String.Format().

Range

A simple min/max numeric range.

RangeList

RangeList.RangeListEnumerator

RxStream

A class representing a receive stream. With this class, you can receive samples from your device into provided buffers.

SoapySDR

Stream

The base class for representing transmit or receive streams. This class will never be used itself. See TxStream and RxStream.

StreamFormat

A set of string constants corresponding to different sample types.

StreamResult

Metadata returned from a streaming operation.

StringList

StringList.StringListEnumerator

Time

Utility functions to convert time and ticks.

TxStream

A class representing a transmit stream. With this class, you can write samples to your device to transmit.

Utility

Utility functions to generate Pothosware.SoapySDR.Device parameters

Enums

ArgInfo.Type

The data type of the argument.

Direction

The RF direction to use for a given function.

ErrorCode

Error codes returned from streaming functions.

LogLevel

The available priority levels for log messages.

 The default log level threshold is Info. Log messages with lower priorities are dropped.

StreamFlags

Bitwise flags to be passed into or returned from streaming functions.

Delegates

Logger.LoggerDelegate

The signature of a function to use for logging.
